Event.Description: The specific task event that occurs at this onset timestamp

Levels.Rest: Subjects are resting without gripping the ball
Levels.Grip: Subjects are gripping the ball either without squeezing (Control group) or squeezing with maximal force (Handgrip group)

Cue.Description: The visual cue that appears on the screen the prompts subjects to grip or rest

Levels.Yellow: Rest - subjects relax without gripping the ball
Levels.Blue: Grip - subjects grip the ball without squeezing (Control) or squeezing with maximal force (Handgrip)
